titleStmt.title: The second part of the anatomie of abuses conteining the display of corruptions, with a perfect description of such imperfections, blemishes and abuses, as now reigning in euerie degree, require reformation for feare of Gods vengeance to be powred vpon the people and countrie, without speedie repentance, and conuersion vnto God: made dialogwise by Phillip Stubbes.
Anatomie of abuses. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Stubbes, Phillip.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. W[ard] for William Wright, and are to be sold at his shop ioining to S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie, being the middle shop in the rowe,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The display of corruptions.
Publication date and printer's name from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his shop ioining to S. Mildreds Church in the Poultrie, being the middle shop in the rowe
